Windlord::

"BY PRIMUS!!! " Screamed scared Windlord then he ran towards crs' 
room, there he saw that the cr where Nightnight had been, it was 
empty...

He came back where Technosis, Psuedo and Atma were "NIGHTLIGHT IS 
MISSING!!!!"  he screamed worried "She have to be around here... 
Maybe she's hurted.....!!!" 

"Or dead..." though Windlord withou say it, he spoke again "Quick... 
Technosis, you and they (Atma and psuedo) search her... quarter's 
area should be close and don't tell anything to Perplex; I'm going to 
capture Termitron before he hurt someone else... or hurt himself... 
Technosis, it's very important don't move anything and don't touch 
anything too until Aerotaur beat other enemy outside... Can you do 
that Technosis?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Technosis: No, but Termitron did, apparently. Perplex just moved in 
with them, he's going to be mad. I would be really mad! What am I 
going to say> That he killed himself? That he was killed by that guy 
out there who never made it into the base? Perplex doesn't know about 
it, he was in stasis lock, so I can tell him that...
>
